channel.title: CVE Feed for MileSight -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MileSight -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22659|2023-07-06T17:00:08.615Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: An os command injection vulnerability exists in the libzebra.so change_hostname functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially-crafted network packets can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-22371|2023-07-06T17:00:07.646Z -- milesight -- milesightvpn
item.description: An os command injection vulnerability exists in the liburvpn.so create_private_key functionality of Milesight VPN v2.0.2. A specially-crafted network request can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-22306|2023-07-06T17:00:08.910Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the libzebra.so bridge_group functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network packet can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-22653|2023-07-17T19:21:25.584Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the vtysh_ubus tcpdump_start_cb functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to command execution. An authenticated attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-22844|2023-07-06T17:00:07.380Z -- milesight -- milesightvpn
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the requestHandlers.js verifyToken functionality of Milesight VPN v2.0.2. A specially-crafted network request can lead to authentication bypass. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-22365|2023-07-06T17:00:08.337Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the ys_thirdparty check_system_user functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted set of network packets can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-22299|2023-07-06T17:00:10.061Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the vtysh_ubus _get_fw_logs functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network request can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-22319|2023-07-06T17:00:07.073Z -- milesight -- milesightvpn
item.description: A sql injection vulnerability exists in the requestHandlers.js LoginAuth functionality of Milesight VPN v2.0.2. A specially-crafted network request can lead to authentication bypass. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-47166|2024-06-04T17:26:33.388Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: A firmware update vulnerability exists in the luci2-io file-import functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.7-r2. A specially crafted network request can lead to arbitrary firmware update. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-32220|2023-06-12T00:00:00 -- milesight -- ncr%2Fcamera
item.description: Milesight NCR/camera version 71.8.0.6-r5 allows authentication bypass through an unspecified method.

item.title: CVE-2023-23907|2023-07-06T17:00:06.747Z -- milesight -- milesightvpn
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the server.js start functionality of Milesight VPN v2.0.2. A specially-crafted network request can lead to arbitrary file read. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-23546|2023-07-06T17:00:06.457Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: A misconfiguration vulnerability exists in the urvpn_client functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially-crafted man-in-the-middle attack can lead to increased privileges. An attacker can perform a man-in-the-middle attack to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-23550|2023-07-06T17:00:09.199Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the ys_thirdparty user_delete functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network packet can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-23571|2023-07-17T13:10:33.978Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: An access violation vulnerability exists in the eventcore functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network request can lead to denial of service. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-23547|2023-07-06T17:00:05.393Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the luci2-io file-export mib functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network request can lead to arbitrary file read. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-23902|2023-07-06T17:00:05.102Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the uhttpd login functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-24519|2023-07-06T17:00:09.566Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Two OS command injection vulnerability exist in the vtysh_ubus toolsh_excute.constprop.1 functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially-crafted network request can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This command injection is in the ping tool utility.

item.title: CVE-2023-24505|2023-05-17T21:25:09.039Z -- milesight -- ncr%2Fcamera
item.description: Milesight NCR/camera version 71.8.0.6-r5 discloses sensitive information through an unspecified request.

item.title: CVE-2023-24497|2023-07-17T18:49:06.435Z -- milesight -- milesightvpn
item.description: Cross-site scripting (xss) vulnerabilities exist in the requestHandlers.js detail_device functionality of Milesight VPN v2.0.2. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary Javascript code injection. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This XSS is exploited through the remote_subnet field of the database

item.title: CVE-2023-24496|2023-07-17T18:49:06.317Z -- milesight -- milesightvpn
item.description: Cross-site scripting (xss) vulnerabilities exist in the requestHandlers.js detail_device functionality of Milesight VPN v2.0.2. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary Javascript code injection. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This XSS is exploited through the name field of the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-24506|2023-05-17T21:36:17.798Z -- milesight -- ncr%2Fcamera
item.description: Milesight NCR/camera version 71.8.0.6-r5 exposes credentials through an unspecified request.

item.title: CVE-2023-24583|2023-07-06T17:00:05.823Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Two OS command injection vulnerabilities exist in the urvpn_client cmd_name_action functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This OS command injection is triggered through a UDP packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-24595|2023-07-06T17:00:10.336Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the ys_thirdparty system_user_script functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted series of network requests can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-24018|2023-07-17T19:24:01.646Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the libzebra.so.0.0.0 security_decrypt_password functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to a buffer overflow. An authenticated attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-24520|2023-07-06T17:00:09.776Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Two OS command injection vulnerability exist in the vtysh_ubus toolsh_excute.constprop.1 functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially-crafted network request can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This command injection is in the trace tool utility.

item.title: CVE-2023-24019|2023-07-17T20:30:34.801Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the urvpn_client http_connection_readcb functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network packet can lead to a buffer overflow. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-24582|2023-07-06T17:00:05.707Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Two OS command injection vulnerabilities exist in the urvpn_client cmd_name_action functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This OS command injection is triggered through a TCP packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-30466|2023-04-28T10:06:26.684Z -- milesight -- nvr%20ms-nxxxx-xxg
item.description:
This vulnerability exists in Milesight 4K/H.265 Series NVR models (MS-Nxxxx-xxG, MS-Nxxxx-xxE, MS-Nxxxx-xxT, MS-Nxxxx-xxH and MS-Nxxxx-xxC), due to a weak password reset mechanism at the Milesight NVR web-based management interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted http requests on the targeted device.
Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow remote attacker to account takeover on the targeted device.

item.title: CVE-2023-30467|2023-04-28T10:12:11.694Z -- milesight -- nvr%20ms-nxxxx-xxg
item.description:
This vulnerability exists in Milesight 4K/H.265 Series NVR models (MS-Nxxxx-xxG, MS-Nxxxx-xxE, MS-Nxxxx-xxT, MS-Nxxxx-xxH and MS-Nxxxx-xxC), due to improper authorization at the Milesight NVR web-based management interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted http requests on the targeted device.
Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow remote attacker to perform unauthorized activities on the targeted device.

item.title: CVE-2023-25105|2023-07-17T19:35:21.941Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the vtysh_ubus binary of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5 due to the use of an unsafe sprintf pattern. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker with high privileges can send HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow occurs in the set_ike_profile function with the secrets_remote variable.

item.title: CVE-2023-25113|2023-07-17T19:35:22.893Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the vtysh_ubus binary of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5 due to the use of an unsafe sprintf pattern. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker with high privileges can send HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow occurs in the set_l2tp function with the key variable.

item.title: CVE-2023-25095|2023-07-17T19:35:20.595Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the vtysh_ubus binary of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5 due to the use of an unsafe sprintf pattern. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker with high privileges can send HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow occurs in the set_qos function with the rule_name variable with two possible format strings that represent negated commands.

item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the vtysh_ubus binary of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5 due to the use of an unsafe sprintf pattern. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker with high privileges can send HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow occurs in the firewall_handler_set function with the src and dmz variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-25582|2023-07-06T17:00:17.238Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Two OS command injection vulnerabilities exist in the zebra vlan_name functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network request can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This command injection is in the code branch that manages an already existing vlan configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-25097|2023-07-17T19:35:20.836Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the vtysh_ubus binary of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5 due to the use of an unsafe sprintf pattern. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker with high privileges can send HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow occurs in the set_qos function with the attach_class variable.

item.title: CVE-2023-25111|2023-07-17T19:35:22.657Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the vtysh_ubus binary of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5 due to the use of an unsafe sprintf pattern. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker with high privileges can send HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow occurs in the set_gre function with the key variable.

item.title: CVE-2023-25107|2023-07-17T19:35:22.172Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the vtysh_ubus binary of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5 due to the use of an unsafe sprintf pattern. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker with high privileges can send HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow occurs in the set_gre function with the remote_subnet and the remote_mask variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-25106|2023-07-17T19:35:22.056Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the vtysh_ubus binary of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5 due to the use of an unsafe sprintf pattern. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker with high privileges can send HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow occurs in the set_gre function with the local_virtual_ip and the local_virtual_mask variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-25110|2023-07-17T19:35:22.544Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the vtysh_ubus binary of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5 due to the use of an unsafe sprintf pattern. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker with high privileges can send HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow occurs in the set_gre function with the remote_virtual_ip variable.

item.title: CVE-2023-25583|2023-07-06T17:00:17.356Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Two OS command injection vulnerabilities exist in the zebra vlan_name functionality of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5. A specially crafted network request can lead to command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger these vulnerabilities.This command injection is in the code branch that manages a new vlan configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-25096|2023-07-17T19:35:20.712Z -- milesight -- ur32l
item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the vtysh_ubus binary of Milesight UR32L v32.3.0.5 due to the use of an unsafe sprintf pattern. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker with high privileges can send HTTP requests to trigger these vulnerabilities.This buffer overflow occurs in the set_qos function with the rule_name variable with two possible format strings.
